amendment.description: Amendment includes physical therapists as an occupation defined as an area of national need to qualify for student loan forgiveness under Sec. 428K of the Higher Education Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 110-523 to include physical therapists as an occupation defined as an area of national need to qualify for student loan forgiveness under Sec. 428K of the Higher Education Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sestak amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
